entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight then diminishing to 20. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
